changelog: * Fixed crash when the satellite recipe had a byproduct of hot fluoroketone.
* Adjusted apconfig.ini to account for weird linux installs where __PATH__system-read-data__ is not valid.
* Added a `configure_server` script to the SAWS folder to help easily set up mod settings for the server.
* Prevented webhost from serving an incorrectly renamed mod file.
* Updated SAWS Client to use an isolated config folder.  This allows you to use the same Factorio executable for both server and client.
* Saves and Mods now go in the `factorio_saws` folder in your archipelago folder.
* This is a port of my PR for vanilla Factorio at https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/4221, hopefully it merges there in time for AP 0.6.4 🙂
